results.title: Dry powder formulation of simvastatin.
results.text_hl: Transport studies revealed that @CHEMICAL_Simvastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@SV@@@ has the ability to penetrate into airway epithelial cells and is converted into its active @<m>CHEMICAL_simvastatin_hydroxyacid</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:C532833 @@@SV hydroxy acid@@@ metabolite.

citations.NLM: Tulbah AS, Ong HX, Morgan L, Colombo P, Young PM, Traini D. Dry powder formulation of simvastatin. Expert Opin Drug Deliv. 2015 Jun;12(6):857-68. PMID: 25244365
